title: Project Management Coordinator Interview
Interview Descriptions: I had an initial phone interview with an HR rep, then I had an in-person interview with 3 employees. The process was simple and quick. Great people, great atmosphere, easy process.
Interview Questions: Tell me about a time you led a project.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Interview Descriptions: Had multiple interviews with them and then they completely ghosted me. I tried to reach out for a follow up and nobody was able to get back to me. It was pretty disappointing since I had reached out a couple weeks later when they said they’d get back to me after a week.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Terros?

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Terros Health (Mesa, AZ) in Mar 2021
Interview Descriptions: Easy to schedule and quick to contact. Ready to answer questions and acknowledge the schedule and high case loads at the start. Easy to talk to and encouraging. Will work with you to find the right placement for you.
Interview Questions: How do you manage high case loads?

title: Behavioral Health Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Terros Health
Interview Descriptions: The man that interviewed me was very nice, and asked about previous experience and why I wanted to work in the field of behavioral health. In addition, he asked about my education and background.
Interview Questions: If I knew how to write a progress note- gave me a scenario

title: Clinician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Terros Health
Interview Descriptions: apply online, outreached by HR for phone prescreen, called by manager for interview.  The interview was lengthy. the manager told me about both the pros and cons of the position which was helpful.

title: Behavioral Health Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Terros Health (Phoenix, AZ) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: Easy process. I was asked a lot of questions related to the position. I was able to tie my previous experiences to the job. Found out later that day that I got the position.
Interview Questions: Describe a difficult situation and what you did to overcome it.

title: BI Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Terros Health (Phoenix, AZ) in Jul 2019
Interview Descriptions: First they will do a phone screen. If that goes well, you will get invited to the office fairly quickly. After that they will disappear and not let you know where  you stand. It is frankly rude to not update candidates.
Interview Questions: What can you do in Python?

title: Peer Support Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Terros Health (Tempe, AZ) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: Interviewing staff was very professional and personable.  Questions they asked were relevant and easy to understand.  They did a great job of making me feel welcome and that they were exited to have me join their team.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when a conflict occurred in the work place and how did you handle it.

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Terros Health (Phoenix, AZ) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very poorly done no compassion at all she nerver called me back until I called her she said she was just gonna call every one she interviewed so she decided to go with her passed employees something she should of known before haveing people come out to interview
Interview Questions: About my experience goes back to 1983 when I arrived in america my moms passing I took care of her for 8 years before she passed on my experience has been very wide spread

title: Administrative Role Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Terros Health
Interview Descriptions: I literally had 4 interviews with this company. During my last interview, the interviewer continuously answered her cell phone. Her attention was on that and not on the interview at hand. The interview felt rushed as if she had other things to do. She informed me that she did not know why she was interviewing me as she doesn't have a say in which individual is selected for this role. Hiring manager gave me his business card and I emailed once and left a voice mail message and he never responded to my request. I know this position has been posted for at least 5 months. No candidate in 5 months is good enough for this company.

title: RBHA Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Terros Health (Phoenix, AZ) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: The Process was very Professional, outline what the job it entailed in full detail. Explained what the expectations of the job would be. In addition, explained their current billing situations and software issues they are encountering and ask what could be done to remedy the situation in detail. I was there the first candidate for this position.
Interview Questions: Please explain in detail your revenue cycle experience.

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Terros Health (Phoenix, AZ) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: About a half an hour process different situational questions about how to handle clients.  I was given a tour and asked about my work experience and explained the details of the job.  I asked questions and the interviewer asked me how I handle different issues with co-workers in the past and what I like about this field of work.
Interview Questions: Situational questions. Why you want the position?
